title: Handle Incorrect Item Shipped Claim
description: A retailer reports they received the wrong item in their recent shipment.

tasks.description: Receive the claim from the retailer.
Review the original order and the pick list to verify what should have been shipped.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the retailer ordered item A but was shipped item B.

tasks.description: Arrange for the incorrect item to be returned at no cost to the retailer.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates a pre-paid return shipping label for the retailer.

tasks.description: Create a new order to ship the correct item to the retailer immediately.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a new order for the correct item.
